website_summaries.verdict: Well-constructed vanity light with a unique look and ample lighting.
pros: Coffee bronze finish and stylish design itself work well many decorating styles
Easy to install and durable for the price
cons: A few buyers did not like the placement of the screws, or the quality of the materials

website_summaries.verdict: An appealing rustic style, though the fixture could be sturdier. It's too large for some bathrooms and requires pricier bulbs for good lighting and stylistic continuity.
pros: Works reliably and offers a stylish update to rooms
Brighter 60-watt lights provide adequate illumination above the bathroom sink
Installation is fairly easy for those with DIY experience
cons: Fixture doesn’t extend out far enough to overhang some larger cabinets or mirrors
(One user solved this by turning it upside down.)

customer_reviews.title: We love this light fixture
customer_reviews.text: We love this light fixture! It's bigger than I thought it would be, but it's perfect for the powder room we put it in. I love the color, shape and character it brought to the space! The 40 watt bulbs are a bit dim, so if you want it really bright, I'd go to the 60 watt.
customer_reviews.author: drhodus24

customer_reviews.title: Nice fixtures
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice but light weight so not exactly screaming quality when you take them out of the box. I put LED Edison bulbs in them and left the bottom cage off because it was just too much. Overall, a nice light once its hung up.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, it's average at best.
customer_reviews.text: It works and looks OK. Still working and looking OK after a couple of months, but I have concerns its made cheaply, mostly out of plastic. I will revisit this review in a couple of months. 11/17 Still holding up well, adding a star to the review. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is that the nut that holds down the light bulbs keeps loosening up and you have to tighten it every 4 months or so. 4/18. Center light fixture stopped working and the ceramic piece is black from , I'm guessing, overheating? It's down now, it's a shame I was hoping it would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Davis

customer_reviews.title: These are great. We replaced a fixture in our small downstairs ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We replaced a fixture in our small downstairs bathroom with this. We love the look. I think in hindsight it's a little big and we could have gone with a 2 light fixture, but construction is decent, and it was easy to install. The directions were much more detailed then I required, so I am guessing even someone with no experience could install this with ease if they simply followed the inscluded instructions. We picked up the bulbs @ Lowes on sale. The nice thing about the 3 lights is the bulbs that are shown in the picture are not overly bright, so 3 lights instead of 2 helps out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing looking fixture but use LED bright bulbs
customer_reviews.text: This fixture, for the price, is so nice! Can’t believe how great it looks in person. Only negative is that we bought the regular vintage style light bulbs which in turn cast a yellow, dull, dim glow. And they were 60watt bulbs! So we’ll be swapping them out for brighter, LED bulbs. Just a heads up before you learn the hard way like we did.
customer_reviews.author: Username_not_found

customer_reviews.title: Great fixture especially for a boy's room
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace an outdated bathroom fixture in my son's bathroom over the mirror. After looking a many light fixtures, I decided on this one. It reminded me of a gym with the cage around the light. It looks just like the picture and was easy to put up. I just held the ladder while my dad installed it. haha Actually, it only took about 20 minutes to install it after taking down the old one. You can't go wrong if this is the look you are wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G. Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed with the quality of this one. The cages didn't fit flush (see attached picture). Seems easy enough to just bend it flush, but they painted it this way. So, if I did that the paint would crack off and would look terrible. The bar that the cages are attached to was also bent. It just seems all together there wasn't much quality control on this item. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Full bathroom set of ' Dynasty Hardware 5000-ORB-3PC Brentwood Series ...
customer_reviews.text: Full bathroom set of ' Dynasty Hardware 5000-ORB-3PC Brentwood Series Bathroom Hardware Set, Oil Rubbed Bronze, 3-Piece Set, With 24" Towel Bar' and 'Moen Brantford Two-Handle Low-Arc Widespread Bathroom Faucet without Valve, Oil-Rubbed Bronze (T6620ORB) ' and 'Keeney PP836-71VBL Tank Lever Faucet Style, Oil Rubbed Bronze ' and ' Design House 519736 Ajax 3 Light Vanity Light,...' Fits the bronze theme but i wish the covers above the bulb were also bronze instead of white
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, great industrial look!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fixture! I actually had to have my contractor install upside down. Once they got my vanity and medicine cabinet installed, there wasn't room to install lights facing down. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Cool. Relatively inexpensive. The install screws are vertical instead of the typical horizontal which made for a bit of a pain installing. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Showstopper!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this lighting! We are in process of remodeling our guest bathroom farmhouse/rustic and my lighting search ended when I spotted this! Easy to install and it gave us the beautiful vintage look I was going for! Like others, we flipped ours upside down. Attaching pic (disregard blue painters tape!)
customer_reviews.author: CoCo

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I put this fixture into my bathroom and I LOVE IT. It's installed upside down because it would otherwise interfere with the opening of my medicine cabinet, and I didn't want to put another hole in the wall, and it STILL looks awesome. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kay. Dee. Kay

customer_reviews.title: You will need to spend more money to buy bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit cheaply made. I had to trim back the mounting screws because the nuts were to small. Also, for this price, and because of all the pictures, bulbs should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Great Rustic Light!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our half bathroom to match our rustic theme and they fit perfectly. For the price it was totally worth it. One thing to note is the light does not come with bulbs so plan on getting those!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We use these in our bathroom and they look great! They match the other fixtures in our house ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our bathroom and they look great! They match the other fixtures in our house and go with the style that we are going for. One thing I wasn't anticipating is they went in facing upward instead of down. For some reason it would only go on that way.
customer_reviews.author: xXGhosterXx

customer_reviews.title: NOT Oil Rubbed Bronze
customer_reviews.text: The description says oil rubbed bronze for # 519736 but when it showed up it is Coffee Bronze which is brown not black distressed like oil rubbed bronze should be.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Goodwrench

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom light!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this light! It's the one piece everyone compliments when they see our new updated bathroom. I bought the used one!! Nothing was wrong with it and it was $20 cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coloring and good quality. They were a bit bigger then I had thought they were. I didn’t look at dimensions. So they are good size. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hegarty

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting set
customer_reviews.text: Makes me sad that it was too big for our space (we bought two sets) but the great news is it is well worth the money and the refund was done quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed because I thought it was oil rubbed bronze
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed because I thought it was oil rubbed bronze, which is normally almost black, and this is very BROWN. I had to spray paint the entire fixture. :(
customer_reviews.author: Danna K.

customer_reviews.title: The fixture itself is very nice, well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The amber lights are not very bright, since the lights were not included, and cost 5.00 each, I will replace them with regular bulbs when these burn out. I bought 2 fixtures, one for over each sink, and the bathroom still isn't bright enough. The fixture itself is very nice, well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: barb wolf

customer_reviews.title: Built so cheap, it overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Low quality even for this pricepoint. Ceramic threads were chipped right out of the box and the light looked too cheap to hang in my home that I'm selling. Cages don't line up, very low quality manufacturing. Don't expect what you see in the pictures. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: conundrumcircle

customer_reviews.title: Think twice...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these last month and went to install them this weekend and one of them is so bent it sticks off the wall at an angle, while the other one is perfect. They were also missing a lot of the screws. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dix

customer_reviews.title: Nice rustic look
customer_reviews.text: Bought some ikea Edison bulbs to go along with this vanity light. It looks amazing in our newly renovated bathroom. Can't speak to the amount it took to install as our contractor did it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylwia

customer_reviews.title: barn yard look
customer_reviews.text: Use this fixture in my bathroom and love it. You have to use Edison bulbs which has a strong yellow tint. I wish I would have realized that before I put it in my bathroom. But I love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: CindyAmazonReview

customer_reviews.title: A perfect accent to my rustic bathroom remodel
customer_reviews.text: A perfect accent to my rustic bathroom remodel. I get equal complements on the light fixtures and the custom vanity. Easy to install and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jadesfire

customer_reviews.title: love this light
customer_reviews.text: love this light! unfortunately it was slightly to big for the spot that I wanted it! literally 1/2 inch to wide. I love it so much we plan on moving the wiring up an inch to give the extra room!
customer_reviews.author: M Seager

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and modern update
customer_reviews.text: My handy husband had no trouble installing 3 of these. We love these in our bathrooms, so modern and fresh. Great price compared to the selection at HD and Lowes. We installed them “upside down” from the stock pic.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to a farmhouse or rustic themed bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to a farmhouse or rustic themed bathroom. The cages on each bulb are fairly large so keep that in mind when space planning for them. Beautiful bronze finish.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Design

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light!!! Needed to do a bathroom makeover for our guest powder room downstairs...I like unique farmhouse/shabby chic style and this fit in perfectly!!!! Obsessed!

customer_reviews.title: But I love this piece and so do my guest

product_meta.title: Design House 519736 Ajax 3 Light Vanity Light, Bronze
product_meta.description: The Design House 519736 Ajax 3 Light Vanity Light features a modern design and a textured, coffee bronze finish with wire shades. This vanity can be used for bathroom vanity lighting and offers reliable illumination with an industrial design. This model uses (3) 60 Watt medium base incandescent bulb (A19 Bulb Type). Bathroom vanity is designed for wall mount applications. Metal cage measures 8-1/8 in. x 6-3/8 in. dia. This unit is ETL/cETL Listed and suitable for indoor use. The Design House 519736 Ajax 3 Light Vanity Light comes with a 10-year limited warranty. Design House offers products in multiple home decor categories including lighting, ceiling fans, hardware and plumbing products. With years of hands-on experience, Design House understands every aspect of the home decor industry, and devotes itself to providing quality products across the home decor spectrum.
feature_bullets: Modern design with metal wire shades
Wall mount applications for bathroom vanities
Uses (3) 60 Watt medium base bulb (A19 Type)
Coffee bronze finish. 13.375 high x 25.75 wide inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars228 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
